articles.title: The winning ticket in the $1 billion Mega Millions lottery was bought in Michigan - CNN
articles.description: Don't forget to check your Mega Millions lottery ticket, especially if you bought it in the state of Michigan. One ticket that matched the six numbers for the $1 billion prize was sold in the state.
